results.title: About Oskie
results.creator_credit: Norman Terrick, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Norman Terrick believes he would not be the man he is today without his father. He lovingly describes a hard working man, who was good at what he did and always had time for his family. Even though he passed away in 1974, Terrick has created this tribute in memory of an inspiring man.

results.title: Picturesque Tasmania
results.creator_credit: G Gamon and Australia. Dept of Commerce. Cinema Branch
results.brief_description: Produced by the Cinema Branch, Australian Department of Commerce. A driving tour of Tasmania from Hobart along the western, northern, eastern and southern coasts focussing on the natural scenery. A number of towns and their various industries can also be seen such as trout hatcheries, the Mt Lyell mine, hops and apple growing. Source: NFSA Film Australia Collection.

results.title: Pictures out of my life
results.creator_credit: Bozenna Heczko, Wolf Koenig, Canada Dept of Indian Affairs and Northern Development and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: The drawings and recollections of Inuit artist Pitseolak, from the book of the same title written by Dorothy Eber. Now in her seventies, Pitseolak is one of the most famous of the graphic artists of the Cape Dorset (Baffin Island) artists’ colony and cooperative. Her coloured pencil and felt-pen drawings vividly illustrate her memories of past life in the Arctic, and of the birds, animals and spirits that figured so large in the daily life of the Inuit.

results.title: Pitch black = Nightfall
results.creator_credit: David Twohy, Tom Engelman and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: Pitch black is a futuristic science fiction thriller filmed on location outside Coober Pedy, Australia. It includes Australian actors Radha Mitchell, Lewis Fitz-Gerald, Claudia Black, and John Moore. The story begins with a spacecraft crashing onto an unknown plant. The few that have survived must band together in an attempt to live through the unknown dangers the plant hides. Initially, the group’s concerns are for water, shelter and the threat of murderer, Riddick (Vin Diesel), who has also survived the crash. However, when one of the group is killed and its leader, Fry (Radha Mitchell), is nearly killed also, the group concedes they must enlist the help of Riddick in order to survive. Still unsure of what the new danger is, the group prepares themselves as best they can, only to find when night falls that nothing could have prepared them for what comes out of the darkness.

results.title: Pins and needles
results.creator_credit: Barbara A. Chobocky, Kim Batterham, Genni Batterham and Documentary Films
results.brief_description: An account of the emotional struggle of a 24 year old woman, Genni Batterham, who contracts Multiple Sclerosis and becomes a paraplegic in less than 18 months. The film examines the attitude and reactions of her parents, husband and society.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Barbara A. Chobocky, Kim Batterham, Genni Batterham and Documentary Films

results.title: Pinocchio (Disney)
results.creator_credit: Hamilton Luske, Ben Sharpsteen, Walt Disney, RKO Radio Pictures and Walt Disney Pictures
results.brief_description: This inspiring tale about the magical powers of believing in your dreams is a timeless fantasy that has delighted generations. Winner of two Academy Awards for Best Score and Song, Jiminy Cricket’s “When you wish upon a star.” While kindy toymaker Gepetto sleeps, a blue fairy brings his beloved marionette Pinocchio to life. With the help of his wise friend Jiminy Cricket, Pinocchio begins a voyage that will test his loyalty, bravery and honesty- virtues he must learn to become a real boy. Features the voices of Mel Blanc, Don Brodie, Walter Catlett, Cliff Edwards and others.
